structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.catch_line: Contract with other state agencies -- Records -- Annual report to Governor.
law.text: The State Board of Medical Licensure may utilize such materials, services or facilities as may be made available to it by other state agencies or may contract therefor, to such extent or degree as the board, in its discretion, may determine. It shall keep accurate records of its activities, reporting annually to the Governor.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(10). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 4.
